'Esteban EcheverrÃ­a Partido' is a partido located in the Gran Buenos Aires urban
area, in Buenos Aires Province in Argentina.

The provincial subdivision has a population of about 298,814 inhabitants [http://200.51.91.231/censo2010/ 2010 Census provisional
results] in an area of , and its capital city is Monte Grande, which is
located from Buenos Aires.

The partido is named after the influential Argentine poet and novelist Esteban
EcheverrÃ­a (September 2, 1805 – January 19, 1851).
